notes.title: Project features
notes.content:
1. Create a project 
2. Link a note category to the project
3. Create up to 5 project board sections.
4. Freely name these sections 
5. Drag and drop 
6. Task count
7. Complete project button
8. Estimated time count


Complete project screen features
1. Tell the user how long it took to complete the project 
2. Tell How many tasks where completed 


Board tasks features
1. Crud opereations 
2. Set a estimated time
3. Set a short description

Planboard 
1. Crud opereations 
2. Drag and drop 


Project Object 
1. id : int
2. creationDate : Date
3. name : str
4. desription: str
5. notes : Object
6. board : Object

notes.title: Notes Todo
notes.content:
1. bookmark 
2. visual polishing
3. make a txt file from note

notes.title: EXTRACT
notes.content:
EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ?)
Haalt het jaar uit een DATE data type

2023-01-01 word 2023

notes.content:
COALESCE(comm, 0)
Kijkt naar alle null waarden in de comm column en vervangt het met 0.

notes.title: SRP
notes.content:
Single Responsibility Principle 

States that a class should have one responsibiliy 
It should encapsulate and handle only one aspect of the software's functionality. This principle encourages you to break down complex systems into smaller, more focused classes, each responsible for a specific task or responsibility.
